bind.name: gotoAndStop!
bind.value: _fromCrew ? (isOwned ? ((shipInfo.isPremium || shipInfo.uiSpecial) ? shipInfo.subtype + '_P' : shipInfo.subtype) : shipInfo.subtype + '_U') : _inSideCompare && _isNotMyShip ? shipInfo.subtype : ((shipInfo.isPremium || shipInfo.uiSpecial) ? shipInfo.subtype + '_P' : shipInfo.subtype)

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'shipClass'; (shipInfo.subtype == ShipTypes.Cruiser) ? tr('IDS_CRUISER') : (shipInfo.subtype == ShipTypes.AircraftCarrier) ? tr('IDS_AIRCARRIER') : (shipInfo.subtype == ShipTypes.BattleShip) ? tr('IDS_BATTLESHIP') : (shipInfo.subtype == ShipTypes.Auxiliary) ? tr('IDS_AUXILIARY') : (shipInfo.subtype == ShipTypes.Submarine) ? tr('IDS_SUBMARINE') : tr('IDS_DESTROYER')

bind.name: tooltip
bind.value: 'ShipParamTooltip';{ id: id, meta: meta, secondLevel: secondLevel, tooltipIDS: tooltipIDS, nameIDS: nameIDS, _hasExcursion: (!excursionOff && !(dockDefaultValues.armourVisibility)), _isArmour: id == 'armour', _armourOff: _armourOff, _torpedoId: aviations.params.ammoNameRaw, _deepWaterTorpedoBombers: deepWaterTorpedoBombers }

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'StatValueBar'; meta ? {_width: 310, _hasDiff: root.hasDiff, _currentValue: root.values[0], _diffValue: root.diffData[0].value, _isGood: root.diffData[0].isGood, _expand: state.active, _invert: ident == 'visibility', rollOver: rollOver, viewParams: viewParams} : null

bind.name: instance

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'TitleVertMockup'; (title != null && titleMockup == 1) ? { meta: meta, isRoot: isRoot, nameIDS: nameIDS, title: title } : null

bind.value: lesta.dialogs.dock.controllers.ControllerParams; 450.0; shipId; 'fullShipParams'; playerShipInfo != null ? playerShipInfo.params : shipInfo.params; testShipParams; 1; 0; null; 0; 1; 1; excursionOff

bind.name: gotoAndStop!

bind.name: gotoAndStop!
bind.value: rankedBattlesSeason.isJuniorSeason == true ? rankInfo.id == 1 ? 'top' : rankInfo.leagueId == 1 ? 'big' : 'small' : rankInfo.id == 1 ? 'top' : rankInfo.leagueId == 1 ? 'big' : rankInfo.leagueId == 2 ? 'medium' : 'small'

bind.name: gotoAndStop!

('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType + postfix) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'stats'; [ {label: 'IDS_CLUB_BATTLES_COUNT', rate: 'no_rate', count: battlesCount}, {label: 'IDS_VICTORIES' , rate: winRate, count: winCount}, {label: 'IDS_DRAWS' , rate: drawRate, count: drawCount}, {label: 'IDS_DEFEATS' , rate: loseRate, count: loseCount}]

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {scaleY: 0.5, scaleX: 0.5, ubScaleY: 0.5, ubScaleX: 0.5, alpha: 0, top: 10}; {scaleY: 1, scaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==0; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==0 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==1; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==1 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==2; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==2 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: text

bind.name: instance
bind.value: isHeader ? 'StatItemHeader' : 'StatRow'; {header: header, title:title, value:value, statData: statData, hintVehicleId: hintVehicleId}

bind.name: instance

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'RankedSeasonFlag'; battleType == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? {_curSeasonIndex: curSeasonIndex, statData: statData}: null

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'AllShipsSelectedItem'; statData.shipsList.length != 0 ? {shipListLength: statData.shipsList.length, totalWinRate: statData.diagStats.totalWinRate, battleType: battleType, currentVehicleId: statData.vehicleId, seasonId: seasonId, gamesPlayed: statData.diagStats.gamesPlayed} : null

bind.name: repeat
bind.value: shipsList; 'ShipRowItem'; {battleType: battleType, currentVehicleId: statData.vehicleId, curSeasonIndex: curSeasonIndex, seasonId: seasonId, _curItemIndex: _curItemIndex}; !(userPrefs.shipSortStatsDirection)

'IDS_IN_CLAN_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'RANDOM' ? 'IDS_IN_RANDOM_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_IN_PVE_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'EVENT_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_IN_EVENT_BATTLE' : 'IDS_IN_COOPERATIVE_BATTLE') + ' ' + toLowerCase(tr(onlyFullBattles ? 'IDS_NOT_LIMITED' : 'IDS_NOT_MORE_THAN'))

bind.name: gotoAndStop!

'RankedBattle_junior' : 'RankedBattle' : queueTypeIdent == 'RANDOM' ? 'RandomBattle' : (queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE') && (operationType == 'event') ? 'PVEBattle_event' : queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE' ? pveIconLabel : queueTypeIdent == 'TRAINING_BATTLE' ? 'TrainingBattle' : queueTypeIdent == 'CLAN_BATTLE' ? 'ClanBattle' : queueTypeIdent == 'EVENT_BATTLE' ? 'EventBattle' : 'CooperativeBattle'

bind.name: text
bind.value: rankedBattleStatus == RankedBattleStatus.ACCEPTED ? 'IDS_RANKEDBATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'RANDOM' ? 'IDS_RANDOMBATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'CLAN_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_CLANBATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'TRAINING_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_TRAININGBATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE' ? tr('IDS_' + toUpperCase(operationEntity.operation.gpName) + '_NAME') : queueTypeIdent == 'EVENT_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_EVENTBATTLE' : 'IDS_COOPERATIVEBATTLE'

bind.name: text
bind.value: queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE' ? tr('IDS_PVE_BATTLE_WITH_DOT') + ' ' + (isChosenOperationOfTheWeek == true ? tr('IDS_OPERATION_OF_THE_WEEK_OPERATION_TITLE') : (!(operationIsHard) ? tr('IDS_OPERATION_NORMAL_DIFFICULTY_TITLE') : tr('IDS_OPERATION_HARD_DIFFICULTY_TITLE'))) : queueTypeIdent == 'CLAN_BATTLE' ? tr('IDS_CLAN_BATTLE_LOADING_TITLE') : queueTypeIdent == 'EVENT_BATTLE' ? ' ' : 'IDS_RANDOMBATTLE_DESCRIPTION'
